root.name: Callahan's Crosstime Saloon
root.description: Based on a series of stories by Spider Robinson, Callahan's Crosstime Saloon stars bartender Mike Callahan as he listens to the drunken laments of his patrons. His Patrons include time travelers, a vampire, and a talking dog. - The first of the Callahan stories was published in 1977.- Spider Robinson composed and performed the song in the game.- The game was designed by Josh Mandel, who also designed Space Quest 6 and Freddy Pharkas: Frontier Pharmacist.
